participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and nurturing, Emily loves to stay active and enjoy life's simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: I will continue to care for my mom and take walks with my dog. I don t drive. I'm proud of my ability to find the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular. I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, Jake is passionate about his interests and is eager to make a difference in his community.
participant_2.background: I miss my dog every day. I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. I wear glasses all day. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. My school life is going well, though I am a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
Pretty good! Just got done with a long day of school and work.
Oh wow, how do you manage to handle that?
I don't know! I guess I'm just used to it.
Are you looking forward to summer?
Yes! I'm really excited to spend time with my family and dog.
That sounds nice! I'm excited to start working out more and getting in shape.
That's great! I'm trying to figure out a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
Oh that's a great idea! I'm sure you could do some social media advertising or print out flyers.
Yeah I've been thinking about that. I just need to figure out how to get the word out there.
I'm sure you'll figure it out! You seem like a smart person.
